title: FS - Down sizing my Chicao Cubs T206 Collection
author: Rascal1010

posts.post_title: FS - Down sizing my Chicao Cubs T206 Collection
posts.post_content:
After working on my collection of T206 Cubs for the last 7 years, I have decided to downsize my collection to focus more on other interests.  I'm not offering all of my Cubbies for sale, but have decided to offer a few mid-grade (most with tougher backs) for sale at this time.  For those that are interested I am offering a handful of rare Sweet Caporal factory 25 backs in this group, most of the ones listed are in the top 5 of their respective front/back combination for condition, a lot of these very rarely are available for purchase, and most of these factory 25's took years for me to find.  I am also offering an assortment of Cycle, Sovereign, Tolstoi & a beautiful Old Mill PSA 6.  
      Here is a list of the cards I am offering at this time, I have attached a few scans but only have a few on my laptop right now, scans will be updated on Thursday afternoon and scans of all cards will be available at that time.  I will be sticking pretty firm to these prices, but will strongly consider offers involving multiple cards.  If you are seriously interested in any of these cards, please contact me and I will make sure to get you scans ASAP.  I will respond to emails in the order in which they are received.  Payment will be via Paypal Goods & Services and all cards will be shipped no charge via USPS insured Priority Mail.

       For anyone putting together player Front/Back combinations I don't have to tell you how tough some of the front/back combinations on this list can be to locate.

       Feel free to contact me with any questions via email [url]Asmusstephen@gmail.com[/url]. 

Thanks,
Steve
 
G. Brown (Browne, Chicago) SC 150/25   PSA 4 Sale Pending
M. Brown (Cubs on Shirt) SC 150/30  SGC 2 $ 250
Evers (Chicago on Shirt) SC 460/30SGC 4 $ 450
Evers (Cubs on Shirt)SC 150/30SGC 4 $ 600
McIntyre (Brooklyn & Chicago) SC 350/30   SGC 5.5 $165
NeedhamSC 460/30 SGC5 $165
Overall - Portrait SC 350/25   PSA 3 $200Rare 350/25 back, Extremely difficult to find
Reulbach - No Glove Showing SC 350/30   SGC 5 $ 165
Schulte (Back View) SC 460/30   SGC 5$165

Take m brown sc 350/25 Chicago for $480


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk

Updated with sold cards removed.  I think I got everyone scans that had requested them, if you did not hear back from me, please send me a PM or an email and I will get it taken care of.

Steve

All sold cards have been removed updated 8/24.  Just a handful of cards left and only 2 factory 25's left out of this group.

Thanks to everyone who has purchased and looked at my cards this go around.

Steve
